title: Dexie Cloud Synchronization Hardening
description:
Address synchronization issues identified in architecture review to prevent data loss and race conditions when using Dexie Cloud sync.

## Context
Audit against Dexie Cloud best practices revealed several patterns that could cause data loss or inconsistencies during cloud sync operations.

## Key Issues
1. Non-atomic import/replace operations
2. Using put() instead of update() loses concurrent edits
3. Read-condition-write patterns in cleanup operations

## References
- https://dexie.org/docs/cloud/consistency
- https://dexie.org/docs/cloud/best-practices

title: Tag Habits Model - Replace Embedded Variants
description:
Redesign the habit model to separate facts (raw habits/entries) from display (tag-based aggregation). See TAG-HABITS-SPEC.md for full specification.

Key changes:
- Raw habits = concrete activities (Shoulder Y, Wall Slide)
- Tag habits = aggregating views (Shoulder Accessory = union of related exercises)
- Entries always logged against raw habits
- Tags compute counts from member habits
- One raw habit can belong to multiple tags
